segments.text: What is that plastic cup for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your doctor has requested a urine sample .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Am I supposed to pee into the cup ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We want what we call a clean sample . Urinate a drop or so into the toilet , and then stop the flow and urinate into the cup .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then what do I do with the cup ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You put the cup in the little cubby in the restroom and close the door to the cubby .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He is looking to see if you have a bladder or urinary tract infection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When will I know the results ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your doctor will call you in a few days with the results .
segments.speaker: S2
